name: Frogger (Sportscene Specialist Press)
overview: A somewhat simplistic, but still playable keyboard controlled Frogger clone developed by Steve Patrick and published as a type-in game in Your 64 No.04 1984/11. You, the frog, have to cross a busy road without getting squashed by the oncoming trucks. Use Z to move left, X to move right, F1 to move up and F3 to move down.
